titles.title: To amend the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 to establish a condition on the provision of assistance under the export enhancement program for the export of durum wheat.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Foreign Agriculture and Hunger.

bill.summary: 9/30/1994--Introduced. Amends the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 to prohibit the Commodity Credit Corporation from providing assistance for the export of durum wheat in any year in which the projected stock-to-use ratio for such item is less than or equal to 40 percent.
